TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied as a treatment for cancer and for primary systemic amyloidosis (a disease in which proteins are deposited in specific organs). It is a type of anthracycline antitumor antibiotic.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer y la amiloidosis sistémica primaria (enfermedad en que las proteínas se depositan en órganos específicos). Es un tipo de antibiótico antitumoral de antraciclina.
